title: Join us for OpenAI’s first developer conference on November 6 in San Francisco
summary: OpenAI is hosting its first developer conference, OpenAI DevDay, on November 6, 2023 in San Francisco. The event aims to bring together developers from around the world to preview new tools and exchange ideas. Attendees will have the opportunity to join breakout sessions led by OpenAI's technical staff. OpenAI's API, which allows developers to integrate advanced AI models into their projects, has been continuously updated and is currently being used by over 2 million developers. CEO Sam Altman expressed excitement about showcasing the latest work to enable developers to build new things. More information can be found at devday.openai.com.
